channel.title: Can't play 317's?
channel.description:
K so I used to able to play all 317's fine. But I can't anymore, it takes about 15 minutes for it load all the way and when I log in it's all laggy and my computer freezes and I have to reboot it. But I can play 508+ Fine.
Why?

item.title: Can't play 317's?
item.dc:creator: @Immortal_Technique Immortal Technique
item.description:
@Immortal_Technique wrote:

Figured it out. I can’t play on servers with 5 or more people on.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't play 317's?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Doesn’t this go in client help?

Read full topic

item.title: Can't play 317's?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“rant, post:6, topic:392532”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=489702.msg3580427#msg3580427 date=1303759011]

Perhaps you have a bad version of java? There are also posibilities that your graphics card is old or something in your computer is broken. How old is your system and how often do you take care of updates and virus cleaning? You may just need to defrag your hard drive for more space for the cache, or you may be running too many processes during the configuration of the webclient. Also how big is the cache size?

508s usually have a universal cache and it’s a completely different loading process.

I think an older system would be less compatable with NEWER versions, than older.
[/quote] however the newer version of the runescape client is less corrupt than the 317 due to the fact that it’s almost never edited. 317 cache’s are completely corrupt most of the time.[/quote]
Then this would be a cache problem, not a hardware? Anyways, if the cache is the case, search for “508 looks” in the server downloads at the client I was working on. Worked fine on my old 2004 laptop, and my 2001 laptop (although a tad of lag on this one, due to the lack of hardware memory). This will tell you if the problem does persist in your computer, or some shitty programmer.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't play 317's?
item.dc:creator: @rant rant
item.description:
@rant wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:5, topic:392532”][quote author=rant link=topic=489702.msg3580416#msg3580416 date=1303757799]
Perhaps you have a bad version of java? There are also posibilities that your graphics card is old or something in your computer is broken. How old is your system and how often do you take care of updates and virus cleaning? You may just need to defrag your hard drive for more space for the cache, or you may be running too many processes during the configuration of the webclient. Also how big is the cache size?

508s usually have a universal cache and it’s a completely different loading process.
[/quote]
I think an older system would be less compatable with NEWER versions, than older.[/quote] however the newer version of the runescape client is less corrupt than the 317 due to the fact that it’s almost never edited. 317 cache’s are completely corrupt most of the time.

Read full topic

@rant wrote:

Perhaps you have a bad version of java? There are also posibilities that your graphics card is old or something in your computer is broken.
